metaTags.metaDescription: Magic WAN connects and secures branch sites, multi-cloud VPCs, and data centers. See how Cloudflare simplifies the path to SASE to replace MPLS.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE for 2nd year. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Magic WAN
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloud-delivered enterprise networking
relatedBlades.copy: Achieve any-to-any network connectivity across branch and retail sites and data centers with Cloudflare's connectivity cloud.

columnContent.title: Improved operational agility
columnContent.description: Centrally manage enterprise network connectivity and security from one interface. On-ramp traffic in minutes with zero-touch configuration.

columnContent.title: Built-in, not bolt-on, security
columnContent.description: Get cloud-native DDoS protection, network firewalling, SSE, and Zero Trust functionality — all deeply integrated and delivered as a service.

columnContent.title: Reduced network costs
columnContent.description: Minimize your branch footprint and shift network functions to the cloud to reduce reliance on expensive MPLS or SD-WAN deployments.

relatedBlades.title: Using Cloudflare to connect your enterprise
relatedBlades.copy: Use Magic WAN Connector, which is available as a physical or virtual appliance, to connect and steer traffic to the Cloudflare network. Magic WAN enforces Cloudflare One security policies and delivers traffic to other sites in your network and to applications in the Internet and the cloud.

relatedBlades.title: Read the CIO's guide to WAN transformation
Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole SASE Leadership Compass
relatedBlades.copy: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

imageAssetFile.title: KuppingerCole Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

content.value: "Cloudflare has built one of the world's most interconnected networks. And to have built-in DDoS protection, traffic acceleration, network firewall, and Zero Trust functionality, over Cloudflare's global IP network that can be managed using a single management plane — is arguably the biggest leap in enterprise network technology in the last couple of decades."
Enguerrand Gave, Head of Portals & Services — RATP

columnContent.title: Streamline branch connectivity
columnContent.description: Facilitate site-to-site connectivity across network locations like branch offices, retail locations, and factory floors with Magic WAN connectors.

columnContent.title: Simplify hybrid and multi-cloud connectivity
columnContent.description: Route and secure traffic across your hybrid and multi-cloud environments.

columnContent.title: Enable secure Internet breakout
columnContent.description: Securely connect to the Internet and cloud with consistent enforcement of traffic inspections and policy controls.

columnContent.title: Deliver global scale
columnContent.description: Use the Cloudflare network to augment or replace legacy MPLS or SD-WAN for more agile, cost-effective deployments and faster performance.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases
